|| *Component ID* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| [BrainRegionABA_HP_PN_LL ABA.HP.PN.LL] || Nuclei of Lateral Lemniscus || nucleus || Decoding of amplitude modulated sounds || Prominent columnar organization, cochlea to IC ||
|| [BrainRegionABA_MM_IC ABA.MM.IC] || Inferior Colliculus || nucleus || Reflex centres of hearing ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionABA_MM_SOC ABA.MM.SOC] || Superior Olivary Complex || nucleus || Bilateral Audition || Projections from both left and right ABA.CN ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HM_ARC BMA.HM.ARC] || Arcuate Nucleus of Medulla || nucleus || Controlling respiratory frequency || Receives fibers from spitothalamic tract and sends<BR>to CR ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HP_PRF_PVR BMA.HP.PRF.PVR] || Parvocellular Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || Flow of respiratory current out of organism || Projects to facial nucleus, hypoglossal nucleus and<BR>parabrachial nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_MM_DSCH BMA.MM.DSCH] || Darkschewitsch Nucleus || nucleus || Mediate the consensual pupillary light reflex || Light in one eye results in pupil changes in<BR>another eye ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_MM_PT_PTA BMA.MM.PT.PTA] || Anterior Pretectum Nucleus || nucleus || Mediate somatosensory and nociceptive information || 3 parallel flows from MC, anterior interpositus<BR>nucleus of TH, GR to dorsal accessory IO ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_INM HMA.HM.INM] || Intercalated Nucleus of Medulla || nucleus || Coordinate tongue movements, vestibuloocular reflex || Receives sensory inputs from neck region ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_PA5 HMA.HM.TGM.PA5] || Paratrigeminal Nucleus || nucleus || Orofacial nociceptive sensory processing || Somatosensory reflex, site for nociceptive inputs<BR>from sciatic innervation field ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_PE5 HMA.HM.TGM.PE5] || Peritrigeminal Nucleus || nucleus || Thermoregulation || Project to thermosensitive neurons of medial<BR>preoptic area ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PN_KFN HMA.HP.PN.KFN] || Kolliker-Fuse Nucleus || nucleus || Control of protruder tongue muscles contraction to maintain respiration || To hypoglossal nucleus and phrenic nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PN_SC HMA.HP.PN.SC] || Nucleus Subceruleus || nucleus || Tongue control || To hypoglossal nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_CRF HMA.HP.PRF.CRF] || Caudal Pontine Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || Mediate head movements || Grinding of the teeth in sleep, projections from<BR>superior colliculus, to spinal cord, extends to<BR>facial ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_GCR HMA.HP.PRF.GCR] || Gigantocellular Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || Mediate head movements || Projects to hypoglossal nucleus, abducens ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_PDT HMA.HP.PRF.PDT] || Pontine Reticulotegmental Nucleus || nucleus || Mediate saccadic eye movements || Inactivation leads to deficit of expression, but<BR>not learning ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_RPO HMA.HP.PRF.RPO] || Oral Pontine Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || Mediation of changing to and from REM sleep || Part of horizontal gaze center, projects to spinal<BR>cord and abducens ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_MM_CJ HMA.MM.CJ] || Cajal Nucleus || nucleus || Integration of head and eye movements, controls downward vertical gaze || Projects to CN3, CN4 nuclei, rotation of body about<BR>its long axis, Project to vestibular nuclei ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_MM_RIMLF HMA.MM.RIMLF] || Rostral Interstitial Nucleus of MLF || nucleus || Integration of head and eye movements, controls upward vertical gaze ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionMBA_HP_PN_PBB MBA.HP.PN.PBB] || Pontobulbar Body || nucleus || Control voluntary muscle activities || Walking, speaking, breathing, part of<BR>corticopontocerebellar pathway ||
|| [BrainRegionMBA_HP_PN_RP MBA.HP.PN.RP] || Rostral Pontine Nucleus || nucleus || Part of learning, motivation, spatial memory pathway || Relay from mammillary body to CR ||
|| [BrainRegionMBA_MM_SC_DEEP MBA.MM.SC.DEEP] || Deep Superior Colliculus || nucleus || Head and eye attention to non-visual stimuli || Receive many types of input and project to numerous<BR>motor-related brain areas ||
|| [BrainRegionMBA_MM_TG_LDT MBA.MM.TG.LDT] || Laterodorsal Tegmental Nucleus || nucleus || Modulating sustained attention or in mediating alerting responses ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_HM_NPH VBA.HM.NPH] || Prepositus Nucleus || nucleus || Integrate PPRF phasic signal to provide tonic signal of abducens || Part of horizontal gaze holding system ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_PT_NOT VBA.MM.PT.NOT] || Nucleus of Optic Tract || nucleus || Encode retinal error information during smooth pursuit eye movements || Guide motor learning during horizontal SP ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_PT_PON VBA.MM.PT.PON] || Pretectal Olivary Nucleus || nucleus || Pupillary light reflex and modulating subcortical nuclei involved in circadian<BR>rhythms || Primary visual centre, involved in the pupillary<BR>light reflex, receives retinal input ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_PT_PR VBA.MM.PT.PR] || Principal Pretectal Nucleus || nucleus || Pupillary light reflex || Affected by visual cortex and projects to EWN ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_PT_SL VBA.MM.PT.SL] || Sublentiform Nucleus || nucleus || Accomodation reflex || Combines visual cortex and retinal input to project<BR>to OCN, receives retinal input ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_SC_SUP VBA.MM.SC.SUP] || Superficial Superior Colliculus || nucleus || Head and eye attention to visual stimuli || Receive input primarily from the visual system and<BR>show primarily visual responses ||
